plot - Plot, various specialized plotting functions and associated utilitiesÂ¶

plot: SpacePy specialized plotting routines

This package provides classes to plot various types of space physics data.

Authors: Brian Larsen and Steve Morley Institution: Los Alamos National Laboratory Contact: balarsen@lanl.gov

Copyright 2011 Los Alamos National Security, LLC.

spectrogram Create and plot generic ‘spectrograms’ for space science.
utils Utility routines for plotting and related activities
